conbody.note:
If you are importing a model, follow these guidelines:
Only an "Admin User" can import models.
Import model files must already reside on the desktop.
The imported model file will include the "imported" tags.
conbody.p: To import or export models for use in another SenSage AP 6.1.x deployment:

ol.li: Select or display the model (For details on accessing a model, see ).
On the Model Menu bar (when the Model Tab is selected), select the import/export menu icon:

conbody.p: The import model(s) popup displays. Dag and drop the model container (ZIP file) you want to import.

If there are existing files on your desktop with the same name/ID, import will overwrite this file. Each ZIP file contains a JSON file for every model. You can convert the ZIP file into formats such as GIT, SVN, etc.
conbody.note: Do not alter the ZIP file as it may corrupt the model file.
